vecHighlight.strDescription: Take part in 20 #FORZATHON Live Events, completing at least Round 1 in each.
Place over 10 different objects in Blueprint Builder
Add your first object in Blueprint Builder
Get a time of 40 seconds or better in the Exomotive Exocet at the Halcyon Point Trailblazer Gate.
Get 3 stars on the Needle Fall Danger Sign in the Morris Minor Traveller.
Get over 180mph in the Koenigsegg CC8S at the Lady On The Lake Speed Trap.
3 Star the The Forest Run Trailblazer Gate in the Peel P50.
Complete a race of 3 or more laps at The Goliath in a Forza Edition Car.
Win a race in the Peel P50.
Complete the Festival Drag Strip in a Hot Hatch in under 25 seconds.
Complete the LEGO Goliath in less than 4 minutes in the LEGO Bugatti Chiron.
Get 3 stars at a Danger Sign in a vehicle from the Trucks Car Type.

data.strFullDescription:
Dynamic seasons change everything at the world’s greatest automotive festival. Go it alone or team up with others to explore beautiful and historic Britain in a shared open world. Collect, modify and drive over 450 cars. Race, stunt, create and explore – choose your own path to become a Horizon Superstar.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1293830/extras/ForzaHorizon4_AboutSectionGIF_1_600x100.gif?t=1702576030[/img]
[b]Collect Over 450 Cars[/b]
Enjoy the largest and most diverse Horizon car roster yet, including over 100 licensed manufacturers.
[h2][/h2]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1293830/extras/ForzaHorizon4_AboutSectionGIF_2_600x100.gif?t=1702576030[/img]
[b]Race. Stunt. Create. Explore.[/b]
In the new open-ended campaign, everything you do progresses your game.
[h2][/h2]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1293830/extras/ForzaHorizon4_AboutSectionGIF_3_600x100.gif?t=1702576030[/img]
[b]Explore a Shared World[/b]
Real players populate your world. When time of day, weather and seasons change, everyone playing the game experiences it at the same time.
[h2][/h2]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1293830/extras/ForzaHorizon4_AboutSectionGIF_4_600x100.gif?t=1702576030[/img]
[b]Explore Beautiful, Historic Britain[/b]
This is Britain Like You’ve Never Seen it. Discover lakes, valleys, castles, and breathtaking scenery all in spectacular native 4K and HDR.
data.strSnippet: Dynamic seasons change everything at the world’s greatest automotive festival. Go it alone or team up with others to explore beautiful and historic Britain in a shared open world.
